1: <pb/><e>Aloj watx' k'anej yin is cuybej Dios</e> <pb/><t>Tzalojc'ulal yet eb c'am tzet yob chi binaj yin, cax tzakan eb yintak cuybej Jehová.</t>
2: <t>Tzalojc'ulal yet eb chi yikej is tenchebal Cham, cax yin masanil is c'ul chi tzakloj eb yintak.</t>
3: <t>A ton eb c'am yobtakil chi yunej, eb chi tzakloj yintak cuybej Jehová.</t>
4: <t>Mamin Jehová, ach max ala', tol chi ikelay a chekbanil, cax tol yowalil chi yuncan elok.</t>
5: <t>Matawal chin ayjic'al yin wikemalil bay a cuybej.</t>
6: <t>¿Tzet yuj xan wal ok q'uixwok aj in c'ul yet ikem in bay masanil a chekbanil?</t>
7: <t>Ok wal watx' k'anej ayach yetok in nabal tojol yayji, yet mayal cuychaj wuj a ley tojol yayji.</t>
8: <t>Chi yochej in c'ul chi wikej a beybal. C'am bak'in chin a bekcanok.</t>
9: <t>A nak ach'ej, ¿tzet wal ok yun beytok nak yin c'am is mul? Asan yin yiken a k'anej.</t>
10: <t>Yin masanil in c'ul chin tzakloj entak. Manchak a cha' wiel in ba yin a chekbanilal.</t>
11: <t>Max cam wal in cuyon a k'anej, yet watx' c'am chi oc in mul ayach.</t>
12: <t>¡Watx' ach Mamin Jehová! ¡Cuyin yin a beybal!</t>
13: <t>Ok walcan el masanil a ley maxax alcan elok.</t>
14: <t>Chi tzaloj aj in c'ul yet chi wikej a tenchebal, yintak wion pax masanil pojanil beyomalil.</t>
15: <t>Ok in naobtanej a chekbanil max ak' ayon, cax ok cam in c'ul in naobtanen a cuybej.</t>
16: <t>Ok wak' tzaloj in c'ul yin a beybal, cax man ok tokcan c'ayc'ulal a k'anej wuj.</t>
17: <t>Ak' a watx'c'ulal ayin, yet watx' iquis intoc'al, cax ok wikej a k'anej.</t>
18: <t>Jak in sat xin, yet watx' chi nachaj el wuj jantak tzet c'ayubtak yin a ley.</t>
19: <t>Ec'jabwom in bay jun tx'otx' ti', man a c'ubaj el a chekbanil ayin.</t>
20: <t>Caw xiwil chi yochej in c'ul chi wojtaknej a ley yin junjun txolan.</t>
21: <t>Ach ton cha tenchanej eb ch'aan, cax cha catabnen eb chi yican el ba yin a chekbanil.</t>
22: <t>Yuj chi wikej a chekbanil, xan chin a col bay is yob k'anej eb chin intaknen elok.</t>
23: <t>Caxc'al a eb yajaw chi waj nanej eb in yetneni, axa pax ayin a chekbej in ti', a a beybal ok in naobtanej.</t>
24: <t>Chi wak' tzaloj in c'ul yuj a tenchebal, tol in cuyomal wal yayji ocok.</t>
25: <t>Toxa chin cam chi wabej; ak' in cawil xin, axcac'alta' aloni.</t>
26: <t>Max in tx'ox tzetbil in bey a satak, max in a tak'weni; cuyin yin a beybal.</t>
27: <t>Ak' in nabal xin, yet watx' chi wikej a beybal; chi yochej in c'ul chin naobtanej juntzan onben c'ayubtak yoqui.</t>
28: <t>Tol ayintok yin cusc'ulal, tec'an chin ot in k'ana', axcac'alta' aloni.</t>
29: <t>Najat chin ecan el bay beal lek'tial, cax chak'on a watx'c'ulal ayin yin a cuybej.</t>
30: <t>Maxax in siq'uil beal yel, cax ay wochwan yin a ley.</t>
31: <t>Mamin Jehová, tzakan inc'al yintak a tenchebal, manokab oc q'uixawc'ulalil win xin.</t>
32: <t>Ipan wak'on wip wiken a chekbanil, yujtol lanan ak'on in nabal.</t>
33: <t>Mamin Jehová, cuyin yin a beybal, chi yochej in c'ul tol tzakan in yintak a beybal tu' masantac'al yet lajubal.</t>
34: <t>Ak' in nabal, yet watx' ok wikej a cuybej. ¡Yin masanil in c'ul chi wochej ikem in bay a cuybej tu'!</t>
35: <t>Iintok bay beal a chekbanil, yujtol ay in tzalojc'ulal yin.</t>
36: <t>Ak' yun in nabal yin yochen tzet yetal chala', cax manokabnak yin pek'al tumin.</t>
37: <t>Manchak in a chatok in tzakloj yintak comon dios. Ak' in cawil xin, yet watx' tzakan inc'al yintak a cuybej.</t>
38: <t>Ak' yun juntzan alben ayin a chekbej in ti', a ton juntzan alben bay eb yikem ayach.</t>
39: <t>Yujtol watx' a ley yul in sat, xan najat checan el juntzan tx'emwal k'anej ayin, tol chin xiw bay.</t>
40: <t>Max wochej oc a chekbanil, ak' wiquisal xin, yujtol tojol ach toni.</t>
41: <t>Mamin Jehová, tx'ox ayin a camc'ulal c'al a colwal axcac'alta' aloni.</t>
42: <t>Caytu' ok yun in paktzen eb chin tx'emoni, yujtol a a k'anej ayoc yipok in c'ul.</t>
43: <t>Ocan wetok yin walon el a k'anej tol yel, yujtol yip in c'ul yayji a ley.</t>
44: <t>Chi wochej chi wikej a cuybej, cax c'amokab chin bekcan yin tojbalk'inal.</t>
45: <t>Cata wal tu' chin beytok yin c'am tzet chin tenoni, yujtol tzakan in yintak a chekbanil.</t>
46: <t>A satak eb cham rey ok wal tzet yetal chala', cax man ok q'uixwok aj in c'ul.</t>
47: <t>Ay in camc'ulal yin a chekbanil, cax ay in tzalojc'ulalil yuj.</t>
48: <t>A a chekbanil chin camc'ulnej, cax wochwan yayji; xiwil chin na' a beybal.</t>
49: <t>Natek alben max al ayin a chekbej in ti'. A a k'anej tu' max ak'can yipok in c'ul.</t>
50: <t>A' ton chin mimanc'ulnen yin in cusc'ulal; a yin alben ipan ak'on wiquisal.</t>
51: <t>A eb ch'aan, c'am chi bek eb in is tx'emoni; palta c'am chin elcan yintak a cuybej.</t>
52: <t>Chin natek a ley yet payxa Mamin Jehová. A yin jun tu' chi wi' mimanil in c'ul.</t>
53: <t>A eb chi unen yobal, chi bekcan eb a cuybej, xan chi tit wowal.</t>
54: <t>A a beybal max waoc in bitok bay sat tx'otx' ti', yujtol ec'jabwom wayji.</t>
55: <t>Mamin Jehová, chach in natek yet ak'balil, chi yochej in c'ul chin k'aytzej in ba yin a cuybej.</t>
56: <t>Chi jay in tzalojc'ulal, yujtol chi wikej a beybal.</t>
57: <t>Mamin Jehová, in satak ayji ocok, toxa max wak' in ti' yin wiken a k'anej.</t>
58: <t>Yin masanil in c'ul chin na' wak'on tzaloj a c'ul, watx' chot a c'ul win xin, axcac'alta' aloni.</t>
59: <t>Max in beyc'ulnej in beybal cax max c'oli wiken a tenchebal.</t>
61: <t>A eb unem yobal max yay eb yal in satak, palta majc'al tojcan a cuybej yin c'ayc'ulal wuj.</t>
62: <t>A yet chuman ak'bal chin aj wan yin walon yuj diosalil ayach yuj a ley, yujtol tojol toni.</t>
63: <t>Watx' wak'on yetok eb ayilwom ayach, c'al eb chi iken a chekbanil.</t>
64: <t>Mamin Jehová, miman txequel a watx'c'ulal bay yulyibank'inal ti', cuyin yin a beybal.</t>
65: <t>Mamin Jehová, watx' ton max ot a c'ul yin jun a chekbej ti', axcac'alta' alben.</t>
66: <t>Chi yochej in c'ul chin a cuy yin jelanil, c'al yin ojtakbilal, yujtol a a chekbanil chi waoc yipok in c'ul.</t>
67: <t>A yet c'amto chi wik tz'um, xiwil bay max wak' c'aytok in ba, axa tinani' xin, chi wikej a k'anej.</t>
68: <t>Watx' ach ach ti', cax watx'c'al tzet chonej. Cuyinc'al yin a beybal.</t>
69: <t>A eb ch'aan, chi yalaj eb k'anej man yelok win; axa in xin, chi wikej a chekbanil yin masanil in c'ul.</t>
70: <t>Max etax el nabal eb yobtakwom, axa in xin, chi wak' tzaloj in c'ul yin a cuybej.</t>
71: <t>Watx' max in el ocok yuj max wik tz'um, tix wal max yun in cuychaj tu' yin a beybal.</t>
72: <t>A walon yul wet, tol yelxac'al watx' a cuybej yintak xiwilok ch'en oro c'al ch'en plata.</t>
73: <t>Ach wal caw max in a watx'nej. Ak' in jelanil, yet watx' chi cuychaj el a chekbanil wuj.</t>
74: <t>A eb ay elapnok yul sat, tzalojokab aj c'ul eb yet chin yilon eb, yujtol a a k'anej max waoc yipok in c'ul.</t>
75: <t>Mamin Jehová, wojtak tol tojol yayji a beybal. A yet chin aon oc yin bilc'ulal, ay ton wal yuj, xan caytu' chotej.</t>
76: <t>Aokab a camc'ulal chin mimanc'ulneni axca alon ayin.</t>
77: <t>Tx'ox watx'il a c'ul ayin, cax chak'onc'al in cawil; ay wal in tzalojc'ulal yuj a cuybej.</t>
78: <t>Elokab q'uixwil eb ch'aan, yujtol chin bajlay yuj eb, caxc'al mi tol c'am in mul. Axa ayin ti', chin naobtanej a chekbanil.</t>
79: <t>Wajokab ba eb ay elapnok yul sat wetok, eb yojtak tzet chala'.</t>
80: <t>Watx'okab yayji in nabal yin a beybal, yet watx' c'am bay ok je' in q'uixwi ajok.</t>
81: <t>Toxac'al nanon yec' in c'ul yin janic' ok in a colo'; palta a a k'anej chi waoc yipok in c'ul.</t>
82: <t>Lanan yetax el in sat yuj in makon yunen alben. Chin naon axca ti': ¿Bak'in wal ok ach jay yuj in ul a mimanc'ulneni? quin chi.</t>
83: <t>Caxc'al mi c'amxa wopiso yuj ichamil, palta c'am chi toj a beybal c'ayc'ulal wuj.</t>
84: <t>¿Jantakto wal tiempo ok wechbanej a beyc'ulnen eb ajc'ul oc win?</t>
85: <t>Eb ch'aan, man tzakanok oc eb yintak a cuybej, mayal watx'nej eb olan bay ok in mukay yalon eb.</t>
86: <t>Masanil a chekbanil yel toni. Ocan wetok xin; ilab c'am in mul yet chi oc eb ajc'ulal win.</t>
87: <t>Toxa chin cam yuj eb, palta c'am chi tojcan c'ayc'ulal a chekbanil wuj.</t>
88: <t>Ak' wiquisal xin, axcata' yayji a camc'ulal, cax ok wiken tzet yetal max ala'.</t>
89: <t>Mamin Jehová, a a k'anej c'am chi q'uexchaji; ayc'al ec' yin tojbalk'inal bay satcan.</t>
90: <t>Ach ti' chak'c'al yun tzet chal yin tojbalk'inal. Ach max a watx'nej oc yip tx'otx' tx'otx' ti', xan ac'ala'c'al yayji.</t>
91: <t>Masanil tzet yetal ac'ala' yayji, axcac'alta' aloni, cax lanan a k'anbalneni.</t>
92: <t>Ta a a cuybej c'am chi yak' in tzalojc'ulalil, mayal xam in lajwi el yuj cusc'ulal.</t>
93: <t>C'am bak'in chi tojcan c'ayc'ulal a chekbanil wuj. A yuj a k'anej xan max ak' wiquisal.</t>
94: <t>Colin el xin, et inc'alta'a, tzakan in yintak a chekbanil.</t>
95: <t>A eb unem yobal lanan yechbanen eb in c'aylay elok, palta ayin xin, a tzet chala' chin naobtanej.</t>
96: <t>Max wila' tol c'am tzet yetal watx'xac'al, axa a chekbanil xin, manxa wal watx'ilok.</t>
97: <t>Xiwil chin camel yin a cuybej. Cac'al ti' in naontek masanil c'u.</t>
98: <t>A a chekbanil naanc'al wuj yin tojbalk'inal, xan yelxac'al jelan in yintak eb ajc'ul oc win.</t>
99: <t>Ec'ban in jelanil yintak masanil eb in meẍtol, yujtol xiwil chin na' yin tzet yetal chala'.</t>
100: <t>Yelxac'al tol chi nachaj el wuj yintak eb icham winak, yujtol ikem in bay a chekbanil.</t>
101: <t>Maj yal in c'ul max watok in ba bay yob beybalej, yet watx' ikem inc'al yin a k'anej.</t>
102: <t>Majc'al in besil in ba bay a ley, yujtol lanan in a cuyoni.</t>
103: <t>Xiwil chial a k'anej chi wabej yintak yal cab.</t>
104: <t>Ay wal in nabal max wi' yin a chekbanil, a xan chi tit wowal yin masanil yob beybalej.</t>
105: <t>A a k'anej in tzektebal yayji yet chin beyi, cax chi tx'oxon in be.</t>
106: <t>Max wak' in ti' ayach ach in Diosal, xan yowalil ok wikej. Ok in k'aytzej in ba yin a ley, tol tojol toni.</t>
107: <t>Mamin Jehová, yelxac'al tol chi cus in c'ul chi wabej; ak' in cawil xin, axcata' aloni.</t>
108: <t>Mamin, cha' in watx' k'anej chi wal ayach yin masanil in c'ul, cax chin a cuyon yin a ley.</t>
109: <t>Toc'alta' ayin oc yin ay is may yet camich, palta c'am chi tojcan c'ayc'ulal a cuybej wuj.</t>
110: <t>A eb unem yobal, chi yaay eb in yalil, palta c'am chin elcan yintak a chekbanil.</t>
111: <t>A tzet yetal chala', a' ayoc in satakok yin tojbalk'inal, yujtol a a k'anej chi ak'on tzaloj in c'ul.</t>
112: <t>Mayal in nabalnej wiken a chekbanil, masantac'al yet lajubal.</t>
113: <t>Xiwil chin cak eb anima cabsat, palta chin camc'ulnej a cuybej.</t>
114: <t>Ach ayach oc wenelok, c'al in colbalbaok; a a k'anej ayoc yipok in c'ul.</t>
115: <t>Elanek in c'atan ex unem yobtakil, chi yochej in c'ul chi wikej is chekbanil in Diosal.</t>
116: <t>Mamin, ak' wip xin, axca yalon alben, cax iquis inc'al; manchak a ten lajwok tzet ayoc yipok in c'ul.</t>
117: <t>Ocan wetok, cax ok in colchajok, cata wal tu' ok wikenc'al a cuybej.</t>
118: <t>Max a tec'ay eb chi yican el ba yin a beybal, yujtol a is jelanil eb, nabac'al toni.</t>
119: <t>Axca wal k'alem yayji eb unem yobal yul a sat, yuj tu' xan chin camc'ulnej a k'anej.</t>
120: <t>A in mimanil chi bilaj a satak, yujtol chin xiw bay a ley.</t>
121: <t>A yin watx'il, c'al yin tojolal chin beyc'altok; manchak in a bektok yul k'ab eb ajc'ul oc win.</t>
122: <t>Ocan yilomalok in watx'ilal; cax manchakokab in yetnej eb ch'aan.</t>
123: <t>Lanan yetax el in sat, yuj in makon a jayi yet chi ul in a coloni. Lanan wechbanen in ak'on bekchaj elok, axcata' aloni.</t>
124: <t>Atac'ala' a camc'ulal, caytu' chot a c'ul win a chekbej in ti'. Cuy in yin a beybal.</t>
125: <t>A chekbej in ayin ti', ak' in jelanil xin, chi yochej in c'ul chi wojtaknej el tzet yetal chala'.</t>
126: <t>Mamin Jehová, tiempoxa ak'on cuenta eb yobtakwom; ilab tol max ten eb a cuybej.</t>
127: <t>Ay in camc'ulal yin a chekbanil, yintak pax ch'en oro yelxac'al watx',</t>
128: <t>a' xan tzakan inc'al yintak a chekbanil tu', cax chin cakon masanil yob beybalej.</t>
129: <t>C'ayubtakxac'al a k'anej, yuj wal tu' xan chi wikej.</t>
130: <t>A yet chi coc' alnelay el a k'anej chon is tzektaneni, chi cuychaj eb yaynakil anima yuj.</t>
131: <t>Xiwil chi yochej in c'ul a chekbanil, axca wal tol chi tak in ti'.</t>
132: <t>Ilintek, cax ok' wal a c'ul win, axca wal chot a c'ul yin eb chach camc'ulneni.</t>
133: <t>Ikbaj in yin a beybal, axca yalon a k'anej. Manchak in a cha' etax yuj yobc'ulalil.</t>
134: <t>Colin el bay yaxc'aynakil eb anima; chi yochej in c'ul chi wikej a chekbanil.</t>
135: <t>Chaokab a c'ul elon jun a chekbej ti', cax chin a cuyon yin a beybal.</t>
136: <t>Xiwilxa chin ok'i, yujtol c'am yelapnok a cuybej yul sat eb wet animail.</t>
137: <t>Mamin Jehová, tojol ach toni, watx'c'al yelapnok a ley.</t>
138: <t>Masanil tzet chala', tojol toni, xan chi je' jaon oc yin co c'ul.</t>
139: <t>Chi tacxac'al el in c'ul, yujtol a eb ajc'ul oc win, max toj c'ayc'ulal a k'anej yuj eb.</t>
140: <t>A alben, chi c'al yunej, tix wal yuj tu xin, xan ayin a chekbej in ti', ayc'al in camc'ulal yin.</t>
141: <t>Yaynakil anima in, intaknebil in el yuj eb wet animail; palta c'am chi tojcan c'ayc'ulal a chekbanil wuj.</t>
142: <t>A a tojolal toc'alta' watx', axa a cuybej yel chi yala'.</t>
143: <t>Manxa animaok ay in c'ul, axa a chekbanil chin ak'on tzalojok.</t>
144: <t>A tzet chala', toc'alta' tojol yoqui, ak' jay in nabal, yet watx' chin iquisbic'al ec'ok.</t>
145: <t>Mamin Jehová, yin masanil in c'ul chach wawtej, tak'wej in xin, yujtol chi wochej chi wikej a beybal.</t>
146: <t>A ayach chi wal in ba; ocan wetok xin, yet watx' chi wikej tzet yetal chala'.</t>
147: <t>A yet c'amto chi k'inibi, chin aj wan in k'anon a colwal, yuj chi waoc a k'anej yipok in c'ul.</t>
148: <t>Yak'ban c'amto chi k'ekbi, chin naobtanej a k'anej.</t>
149: <t>Mamin Jehová, ab in k'anej yuj a camc'ulal; ak' in cawil, atac'ala' a tojolal.</t>
150: <t>A eb chin ukten ec'ok lanan jitzontek ba eb in c'atan, palta najat ayil eb yin a cuybej.</t>
151: <t>Axa pax ach Mamin, cawil ayach ec'ok, yel ton chi yal masanil a chekbanil.</t>
152: <t>Payxataxc'al max wojtaknej el yuj a chekbanil, tol ach max a tz'uncan el yich a ley tu' yin tojbalk'inal.</t>
153: <t>Iltek in yailal Mamin, cax chin a coloni, yujtol c'am chi tojcan c'ayc'ulal a cuybej wuj.</t>
154: <t>Colin yin in yailal, cax chin eonc'al ec'ok; ak' wiquisal xin, atac'ala' yalon alben.</t>
155: <t>A eb unem yobal, c'am yalon yet eb yin a colwal, yujtol man tzakanok eb yintak a beybal.</t>
156: <t>Mamin Jehová, puch miman yayji oc a watx'c'ulal. Ak' wiquisal xin, atac'ala' a tojolal.</t>
157: <t>Xiwil eb ajc'ul oc win chin aon oc yin witz'anil, axa in xin, c'am chin elcan yin tzet yetal chala'.</t>
158: <t>A eb chi ec' yiban, c'am chi techaj eb wuj, a ton juntzan eb c'am chi iken a k'anej.</t>
159: <t>Mamin Jehová, yelc'al chin camel yin a chekbanil. Ak' wiquisal xin, yuj wal a camc'ulal.</t>
160: <t>A a k'anej caw wal yel, tojol ton masanil a ley, cax c'am bak'in chi lajwi ayok.</t>
161: <t>C'am in mul cax chin yukten ec' eb anima miman yikbej, palta ay yelapnok a k'anej yul in sat.</t>
162: <t>Chi tzaloj in c'ul yin alben, yintak pax axca chi yuncan el c'ul mac chi yi' mimanok is tumin.</t>
163: <t>C'am chi cha in c'ul naoj aj k'anej, chi taccan el in c'ul yuj, palta chin camel yin a cuybej.</t>
164: <t>Yin coc'takil chi walon watx' k'anej ayach, yujtol tojol ton a ley.</t>
165: <t>A mactxel chi camc'ulnen a cuybej chi yak' eb nabal yin junc'ulal, cax c'am tzet chi ak'on ayc'ay eb.</t>
166: <t>Mamin Jehová, lanan wechbanen in a coloni, yujtol lanan wiken a chekbanil.</t>
167: <t>Lanan wiken tzet yetal chala', cax ay wal in camc'ulal yin.</t>
168: <t>Lanan wiken tzet chala', a ton a chekbanil. Ojtak masanil in beybal.</t>
169: <t>Mamin Jehová, apnokokab yel waw a satak, ak' jay in nabal axcata' yalon a k'anej.</t>
170: <t>A in txaj xin, apnokokab a satak; colin elok, atac'ala' alben.</t>
171: <t>Walokab watx' k'anej en xin, yujtol ach max quin a cuy yin a beybal.</t>
172: <t>Ok in bitnej junok bit yuj alben, yujtol a masanil a chekbanil, tojol yayji.</t>
173: <t>Watx'xac'al yayji a k'ab yin yak'on colwal ayin, yujtol xiwilxac'al max wochej a chekbanil.</t>
174: <t>Mamin Jehová, yochwan wal in c'ul tol chin a colo'. Ay in tzalojc'ulal yin a cuybej.</t>
175: <t>Chi wochej tol iquis inc'al ec'ok, yet watx' ok in bitnok ayach. Ocokabc'al a tojolal wetok.</t>
176: <t>Max in c'aytok axca no calnel chi saklemtok. Sebach, sayin ec' ayin a chekbej in ti', yujtol c'am chi tojcan c'ayc'ulal a chekbanil wuj.</t>
